name: LOST SPHEAR
description: A young man, who suffered a phenomenon that he had never seen, faces an ominous power that threatens the fabric of reality. Awaken the power of Memory to restore what was lost!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: INTEL Core i3 2.4GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX460 / Radeon HD5750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound® Compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10(64bit) Processor: INTEL Core i5 2.0GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX560Ti / Radeon HD7770 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound® Compatible sound card
